H0.text: Associated with salmon fishing and whisky production, which is the second longest river in Scotland. Tay

H1.text: Associated with salmon fishing and whisky production, which is the second longest river in Scotland. Dee

H2.text: Associated with salmon fishing and whisky production, which is the second longest river in Scotland. Don

H3.text: Associated with salmon fishing and whisky production, which is the second longest river in Scotland. SPEY

A4.text: The River Spey is the third longest river in Scotland.

A5.text: The river is an important location for the traditions of salmon fishing and whisky production in Scotland.
